name: Fowl Play (AKA Chicken Chucker)
description:
This was created as the second, of five, Rapid Prototype Production (RPP) projects.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Farmer movement

Space - Capture and throw chickens, when in close proximity 

R - Move to level 2, restart level 2

Bug: Capturing chickens and throwing them into the coop at too close of a distance will create a glitch, in which the player is no longer able to capture chickens. This is likely a result of the particle effect.
